name: Mitgo
description:
Mitgo is a global tech company focused on delivering innovative solutions and promoting entrepreneurship.
Our purpose is to build, invest in, and nurture online businesses. 
Mitgo offers solutions and services in the MarTech, FinTech, and Smart Shopping sectors. 
These currently include Admitad (est. 2010), native-advertising network Takeads, mobile apps services Mobmio, referral advertising solutions Tapfiliate, voucher-based solutions for premium media FairSavings and cashback service platform CheckRewards. 
Mitgo commits to helping its partners make smarter decisions in their marketing and eCommerce efforts, fuelling the adoption of innovative ideas and preparing them to be launched and scaled-up within global markets. 
The company, headquartered in Neckarsulm, Germany, employs over 500 specialists across 10+ offices, spanning the USA (Chicago), Europe (Amsterdam, Warsaw, Kyiv, Minsk and Tbilisi), Brasil (S√£o Paulo), Mexico (Mexico City), the UAE (Dubai), and India (Gurugram). 
The company's founder and CEO, Alexander Bachmann, was featured in Forbes Magazine and recognised as one of the ‚ÄòTop 50 Game Changers‚Äô by OMR Online Marketing Rockstars.
www.mitgo.com 
PRESS ENQUIRIES incl imagery and markets data: press@mitgo.com 
CORPORATE NEWS and PRODUCT UPDATES www.mitgo.com/news

The AI market is set to reach $184 billion in 2024, with AI revolutionizing MarTech industry. Mitgo Group is investing in the Spanish startup studio AILABIKA to enhance AI tool development in MarTech and AdTech.

Max Volokhoff Volokhov, CEO of Mitgo Ventures, says, ‚ÄúFor us, AI is a practical set of tools that can boost progress in MarTech, AdTech, and Affiliate marketing.‚Äù

Founded in 2023, AILABIKA focuses on AI-driven startups and AI consulting. CEO Kyrylo Kravchenko aims to launch 2 AI-based projects with ARR of at least $10 million in the first year.

Mitgo‚Äôs strategic investment underscores our commitment to AI advancements in MarTech and AdTech. Stay tuned for AI-driven innovations redefining the landscape of marketing technologies.

Transforming fintech landscape in the affiliate marketing industry ‚ö° 

We are thrilled to announce a major investment of $20 million in our newly launched fintech arm, Capygroup, marking a significant step in our strategic expansion into the fintech sector.

üí° Why this matters: Publishers in the affiliate market are often underbanked, missing out on billions in potential profits due to the limitations of traditional financial institutions. Capy is set to bridge this gap with innovative solutions designed specifically for the affiliate sector.

üìà  Accelerated payment solutions: Capy's embedded finance technology aims to drastically reduce payment terms from 60-120 days to just one day, accelerating growth and boosting profits through faster capital turnover.

With accelerated payments and specialized financial solutions, Capy is poised to become a key player, driving growth and profitability for our partners and clients.

We're Proud to Announce: Mitgo is Among the Global Most Loved Workplaces 2024! üåü

For the second year in a row, Mitgo has been recognized by Newsweek magazine as one of the world's top 100 workplaces! This incredible achievement is a testament to our amazing team and our commitment to creating a supportive, respectful, and dynamic work environment.
A huge thank you to all our employees for their support. Your feedback and hard work make Mitgo a fantastic place to be!

Read more about this exciting news here: https://lnkd.in/eECRGKXf 

Let‚Äôs make our workplace even better together. üöÄ
#Top100 #MostLovedWorkplace #TeamMitgo

üèîÔ∏è Big News from the Top of the World! üåç

Our CEO, Alexander Bachmann, has reached the summit of #MountEverest! He made it to the top at 2:16 AM Nepal time today, May 23rd, proudly waving the Mitgo flag.

Despite being forced to turn back during his first attempt due to bad weather, Alexander didn‚Äôt give up. He tried again and succeeded, demonstrating the determination and never-give-up attitude we cherish at Mitgo Group.

Alexander‚Äôs journey encourages us all to keep reaching for our highest goals. It's a proud moment for all of us at Mitgo, as our flag flew high on the peak of the world!

Please join us in congratulating Alexander on this incredible achievement! üéâ

#Leadership #Resilience #Everest2024 #Mitgo #AchievementUnlocked

üåü Exciting Partnership Announcementüåü 

We are thrilled to share that FairSavings, one of Mitgo businesses, has partnered with the coupon site 20minutos, a top-tier weekly online news media in Spain. 

This partnership aims to deliver unparalleled value to the 60 million+ monthly users of this influential media platform.

Fairsavings will provide brands with numerous opportunities to achieve their goals within this prominent Spanish newspaper's ecosystem.

20minutos is part of HENNEO, a leading Spanish media and technology group known for its innovative approaches and extensive reach.

Ivan Fernandez Gomez, Head of FairSavings Spain & Mexico, said, "We are excited about this partnership with 20minutos and the opportunity to enhance the value we bring to users and brands. Our goal is to create a seamless and rewarding experience for everyone involved."

Stay tuned for more updates!

#Partnership #Fairsavings #Henneo #20minutos #AdTech

Kicking off our running season with a strong #10km start! üí™üèª
Yesterday, our German team joined 7,500 other runners in the Trollinger Marathon.

"I love participating in sporting events with my colleagues. We always try to support each other in our training, stay motivated, and achieve new goals together as a team. Despite feeling tired during the long run, crossing the finish line brings a special feeling of accomplishment! I can't wait for our next challenge," says Veronika Batmanova, Employer Brand Manager at Mitgo.

This event marked Mitgo's first run of 2024, and every member of our team successfully completed the race. üèÉ‚ôÄÔ∏è What an amazing day filled with unforgettable emotions! üôåüèª

#trollingermarathon #corporaterun #mitgo

Breaking News from Everest Basecamp! 

Alexander Bachmann, CEO of Mitgo Group, is the first to install #starlink Terminal at Everest Basecamp, at a breathtaking altitude of 5300 meters, and has activated internet speeds of up to 160 Mbps.

Imagine having super-fast internet at the top of the world!

#MitgoGroup #Innovation #EverestBasecamp #Starlink
